title: Extra chocolately banana bread
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened or cooking margarine', '400g caster sugar', '4 eggs', '6 bananas, mashed', '2 teaspoons vanilla essence', '375g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '20g cocoa powder', '240g half fat soured cream or creme fraiche', '170g dark chocolate chips']
